ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: I just turned level 15, magician......and I m not totally sure, but I think I started putting practice into the skill at level 12....possibly earlier, as I
ygData.messageBody:
I just turned level 15, magician......and I'm not totally sure, but I think
I started putting practice into the skill at level 12....possibly earlier,
as I wanted to try and put one in everything.

-----Original Message-----
From: TkAdam@... <TkAdam@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 4:24 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] neglected melee skills..


>From: TkAdam@...
>
>In a message dated 5/12/99 4:20:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
>shanna@... writes:
>
>> I did put practice points into piercing, but I can't get it to go above
5.
>> I don't know what,
>> if anything, I'm doing wrong.
>>
>
>I do not know what level you are... but us spell casters do not do well
with
>weapon skills. You can only get the skill to 3*level + 3.
>
>Also, if you buy a skill late... say when you are 15... for some reason you
>will not see that you have gone up intill you get a rank of 16. (don't
know
>why it happens... but it does) so you are learning... it is just invisible
>to you.
>
>Sonoroud.
>
